name: Lunch and Learn - Auto Layout
description: With the release of Auto Layout, designing for screens has become supercharged. Components are now much more flexible, allowing for a single master component to be reused in ways that couldnâ€™t be done before. For this Lunch and Learn at Maark HQ, I "live-designed" 9 different components to share some of the ways we've been using this new feature to work faster, and with more consistency. Sharing this file now in hopes that the Figma community finds it useful!
